field.title: Hide some informations the user profile
field.description:
If you want to hide a tab in the user profile view add it here. Add 'userprofile-view' to hide the "Timeline" tab, 'userprofile-info' to hide the "Info" tab, 'userprofile-followers' to hide the "Followers" tab, 'userprofile-following' to hide the "Following" tab, 'add userprofile-documents' to hide the "Documents" tab, 'userprofile-workspaces' to hide the "Workspaces" tab, 'userprofile-group' to hide the "Groups" tab.
Hiding a tab will also block hide from the user view the relevant informations, i.e. if you remove the "Following" tab, you will not see the "Following" portalet under the icon avatar.
